title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 336.9 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 336.9 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Promotion shall
mean an increase in a professional employee's basic annual salary with a change
in title and movement to a higher salary rank, resulting from a permanent
significant increase or change in his or her duties and responsibilities as a
consequence of movement from one position to another of greater scope and
complexity of function at the same or different college. (b) Immediate supervisor shall mean the
person designated by the chief administrative officer for the purpose of
evaluating professional employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
336.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
